Simple demos showing how to deliver a dynamically generated page
using different web frameworks.

First install pisa and the required modules.

WSGI
====

> cd wsgi
> python pisawsgidemo.py

DJANGO
======

> cd djangoproject
> python manage.py runserver 8080

TURBOGEARS
==========

> cd tgpisa
> python start-tgpisa.py

CHERRYPY and KID
================

Start demo like this and point your browser to http://localhost:8080/

> cd cherrypy
> python demo-cherrypy.py
